Package swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ALRGenerator<I extends Item,S extends ALRState<I>>
    Base class for LR(0) and LR(1) parser generators.
    FirstSets
    Calculates and caches the follow sets for the given grammar
    FollowSets
    Calculates and caches the follow sets for the given grammar
    GrammarInfo
    This class contains a Grammar extended by more information, like the set of nullable nonterminals and the FIRST sets.
    LR0Generator
    Implements ALRGenerator.createDFA() for the creation of LR0 grammars
    LR1Generator  
    NullableSet
    All Terminals of a Grammar that can derive Terminal.Epsilon

    GeneratorException  
    ReduceReduceConflict  
    ShiftReduceConflict
